header.label: REFERENCES
header.title: Reliable Business Partnerships and Project Experience
header.intro: EMOF Teknoloji provides high-precision manufacturing solutions in many sectors, primarily in the aviation and defense industries. Below are the main areas we serve and sample project types.

sectors.title: Commercial Aviation
sectors.desc: Fuselage, connection, and structural support parts for passenger aircraft.

sectors.title: Defense & Space
sectors.desc: Precision machined components for UAV, helicopter, and satellite platforms.

sectors.title: Industrial Machinery
sectors.desc: Engine and body elements for high-strength mechanical systems.

projects.name: Structural Connection Elements
projects.detail: Aviation standard connection and bracket parts manufactured from aluminum and titanium.

projects.name: Engine Support Components
projects.detail: CNC machined engine components resistant to high temperature and mechanical load.

projects.name: Prototype Fuselage Panels
projects.detail: Low-volume, high-precision fuselage prototype parts for new platforms.

referencesList.name: NETAS
referencesList.description: Turkey's leading telecommunications and information technologies company.

referencesList.name: Audio Electronics
referencesList.description: Leading manufacturer in building communication and security systems.

referencesList.name: TCI Cabin Interior
referencesList.description: Global brand in aircraft cabin interior systems design and manufacturing.

referencesList.name: Profilo Payment Systems
referencesList.description: Payment recording devices and electronic solutions.

referencesList.name: Penta Electronics

referencesList.name: CRC Power Solution
